posts.content:
Hi all,

When I bought my Pitt interior one of the things missing from it was the table leg. I have the big table with the double leg behind it, so making it free standing.

I have to get a leg made and source the hinge. I have a few photos to go by, but would anybody be able to supply me with some measurements? Also would anyone have any ideas on getting as close as posbbile to an OG hinge?

I'd like to get this as close to original as I possibly can, as the rest of the interior is so nice. I'd be very grateful and promise a pint or two at a show!

Thanks,

Mark

author.location: Essex but I'm nothing like the twats on the telly.

posts.content:
Aloha Mark!
You've only got to ask dude
Pm me your email address again and I will take some pictures and do a very child-like drawing with the measurements for you. The hinge will be the easy part as they are nothing special, what will stump you is the sprung clip bit that keeps the leg locked down as I've never seen anything even remotely like it for sale ever anywhere not never ever
There's a pretty bad picture of it on this thread on volksmoan

http://www.volkszone.com/VZi/showthread.php?t=560454

Anyway, I will sort pics tomorrow. Are you going to be at peppercorn/sweetcorn and you can have a proper look? If not, I'm hoping to be at action depending on how little Empi is doing.

Cheers, Lee.

Ah thanks Lee once again!

I know you've had your hands just slightly full at present so didn't want to trouble you

Will pm email, thanks loads dude!

Mark

author.location: Essex but I'm nothing like the twats on the telly.

posts.content:
Mark,
I forget to say that I expect to see pictures of the finished article

Cheers, Lee.
